channel.title: interview on ZaPlatform Blog | By Zak
channel.description: Recent content in interview on ZaPlatform Blog | By Zak

item.title: How to crack any Android interview
item.description: Interviews are stressful by design in preparing for it, in waiting to be interviewed, and within the interview itself and it gets more and more when you get asked about new things that you never knew or heard about before the interview.
